sense.def:
Kadar človek
alternates between two things
redno počne ali uporablja najprej prvo in potem drugo stvar.

seg.quote: They alternated between patronising us and ignoring us.

sense.def:
Kadar ena stvar
alternates with another
se obe stvari redno dogajata druga za drugo.

seg.quote: The Third World suffers from an annual cycle of drought alternating with flood.
...an alternation of right-wing and left-wing governments.

sense.def:
Dejanja, dogodki ali postopki, ki so
alternate
se redno dogajajo drug za drugim.

seg.quote: ...the alternate contraction and relaxation of muscles.
Each piece of material is washed alternately in soft water and coconut oil.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj dogaja
on alternate days
se na en dan zgodi, naslednji dan ne, potem se spet zgodi in tako naprej. Podobno se nekaj lahko dogaja
in alternate weeks
torej v tednih, ali
in alternate years
v letih.

seg.quote: We saw each other on alternate Sunday nights.
